appsgate.lig.context.user.impl
Class AppsgateEndUser

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.context.user.impl.AppsgateEndUser

public class AppsgateEndUser
extends java.lang.Object

This class is Appsgate end user implementation. It describe how a end user is represent in the Appsgate context.

Since:
July 19, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
